com.reportmill.shape

Class RMLabels

  • java.lang.Object
    • SnapObject
      • com.reportmill.shape.RMShape
        • com.reportmill.shape.RMParentShape
          • com.reportmill.shape.RMLabels
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RMTypes, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class RMLabels
extends RMParentShape
    This class represents a block of labels.
